Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Think nature', 'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Hair Type': 'All Hair Types16.9fl.oz,All Hair Types', 'Scent': 'Citrus,Orange', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.7 x 7.8 inches; 1.06 Pounds'}
Review Text: This smells amazing. It is very gentle. I find that I need to lather more than once to get that clean feeling that I'm looking for though. The scent is a light citrus.

reference_summary:
AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids AUGNORYE {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'} I really only wanted this for the cape and the scissors and the scissors are decent. I've been using them to shape the recent hair cut I gave myself. They are sharp and have a good weight to them. I have not used the thinning shears yet so I cannot speak to them. The other items in the kit are all pretty basic and cheap. I gave the thin plastic combs to my daughter to use with her dolls. The cape is thin and the strings in the back for tying seem flimsy. One of the strings is way to too making tying difficult. I have not had a need for any of the other items. I do like the storage case though...a nice compact way to keep everything together and easy to find when it is needed. I like the scissors 2 Pack Hair Towel Wrap Turban Microfiber Drying Shower and Bath, Twist Head Towels with Button, Magic Quick Dryer, Hair Care for Women and Girls, One Wrap Plus One Cap and Two Velvet Hair Bands MEETWIN {} A lot of quality in these products. Extremely soft like a blanket or child's plush making it very comfortable to use and no stress or tension on the hair. The turbine has been great for my daughter. Much easier to get on her thick hair after it has been freshly washed. The twist towels always hurt her ears and since I wash her hair in the shower, getting her towel wrapped head in a tee shirt could at times be difficult. The turbine is easy on her ears and comfy all over. It isn't bulky making it easier to get dressed with it on after a shower.
I use the wrap towel and it works great. Really soaks up the excess water. The button and elastic loop are sturdy, they don't feel like they will fall off or snap from regular use. The scrunchies are a bonus. They too are soft and velvety. Not needed for my hair styles or my daughter's really she still loves them even just to wear on her wrist.
I have multiple wrapping hair towels but these are my new favorites. Soft and comfortable Barber Hair Cutting Cape for Men Women, Made with Ultra Soft Silk Fiber, 63" x 57" SmoTecQ {'Package Dimensions': '11.8 x 9.2 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Works well. Full coverage and easy to use closure- hook and eye on stretchy elastic. I don't know about it being "ultra soft", it feels like most hair cutting capes...kind of plastic like. Works for my family's needs. Does the job 5pcs Nail Art Liner Brushes, Lystaii Dual-ended Painting Nail Design Brush Pen Include Liner Brushes and Dotting Pen Nail Art Point Drill Drawing Brush Double Ended Dotting Tools Set 5,7,9,11,14mm Lystaii {'Package Dimensions': '9.41 x 3.86 x 0.75 inches; 1.41 Ounces'} I don't paint my nails often, but I do like the change a little polish can bring to my look. I have just made my first attempt at using gel polish and I am loving the results and longevity gels provide. I did a few simple polka dots on my nails to test out these nail tools. It worked out just fine. I like that the glitter is inside the base so that the outside is smooth to the touch. The different colors also makes it easy to differentiate between the various sizes at a glance. Next time I'll use the brush end to add some stripes. The metal end was easy to clean with just the wipe of a cotton ball. I'll clean the brush side with soap a water when using gels and acetone when using regular polish. Easy to use for a beginner Microfiber Hair Towels - 5 Towel Set – 5 Beautiful Colors - Great for all Hair Types - Size (10 x 26 inches) Lightweight, Absorbent, and Ultra Soft. Colors Rose, Pink, Gray, Blue, and Lilac. AViBNiUM {'Brand': 'AViBNiUM', 'Towel form type': 'Hair Towel', 'Age Range (Description)': 'All Ages', 'Material': 'Microfiber', 'Product Dimensions': '26"L x 10"W', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 10 x 3 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '860005528004'} Light weight, absorbent and wash and dry well. Very soft and comfortable to wear. The elastic hoop and be a little annoying to get around the button when working blindly, but not enough to dislike these hair towels. Soft and drying Think Nature Orange Blossom Shampoo, No Sulfate Paraben, All hair types16.9fl.oz(500ml) think nature {'Brand': 'Think nature', 'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Hair Type': 'All Hair Types16.9fl.oz,All Hair Types', 'Scent': 'Citrus,Orange', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.7 x 7.8 inches; 1.06 Pounds'} This smells amazing. It is very gentle. I find that I need to lather more than once to get that clean feeling that I'm looking for though. The scent is a light citrus. Smells amazing
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user continues to focus on haircare, DIY grooming, home haircuts, and nail art, now increasingly appreciating products with pleasant scents alongside functional performance. Their recent exploration of nail design tools reflects a desire for creative expression in their grooming routine.

- **Product Preferences:** They prefer practical, quality tools that emphasize comfort, functionality, and sensory appeal, showcasing an evolving interest in products that not only perform well but also smell delightful. 

- **Usage Patterns:** Engaging in self-grooming and family care, especially for children, the user seeks versatile tools that simplify diverse hair and nail needs while enhancing shared grooming experiences.

- **Satisfaction Factors:** The user values ergonomic and efficient items, prioritizing ease of use and maintenance, as well as thoughtful design elements that improve their grooming routine.

- **Aesthetic Preferences:** They prefer compact, organized, and lightweight storage solutions, valuing visually appealing tools that help maintain a tidy grooming setup.

- **Overall Rating Perspective:** The user adopts a balanced approach to evaluations, focusing on functionality while appreciating sensory and design characteristics. Recent purchases indicate an ongoing commitment to quality and practicality, particularly in tools that enhance efficiency and allow for creative expression in grooming activities. 

The user's focus on effective, enjoyable grooming experiences continues to guide their product choices, integrating innovative haircare essentials into their regimen.
